players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote to arrest him immediately to keep the town safe."
Charlie: "That's a bold accusation, Bob. Why would you immediately jump to that conclusion without any discussion?"
Diana: "I think we need more discussion before voting. Bob, why are you so sure about Charlie?"
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it. We cannot afford to hesitate; arresting him now is the only way to protect the town."
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she is the mafioso. Bob is trying to mislead us."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, who did you investigate last night and what did you learn? Bob already claimed to investigate Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
